cause.description:
Refugees running from the Genocide in Darfur are trying to find shelter in Israel. 3,000 refugees are based in the southern part of Israel. They are getting no help from the Israeli Government. Students from Be'er Sheva Universty are taking money out of their pockets to help the refugees.
1. Save the refugees
cause.mission: give the refugees from Darfur shelter in Israel
cause.name: Help Darfur refugees in Israel
